column1: ep1_decision.0101.desc0:"Malingerers! Sluggards! Do-nothings!\n\nMy court is #EMP beset#! with parasites like aphids in a garden
column3: snoring day and night and leaving their chamber pots strewn through the cramped halls.\n\nThis cannot stand. We simply don't have #EMP room#! for all these wandering strangers."

column1: ep1_decision.0101.a0:"[capital.GetNameNoTierNoTooltip] is not an inn. Be gone
ep1_decision.0101.b0:"Everyone who lacks a job or my blood
ep1_decision.0101.c0:"I suppose we could put some beds in the stables..."
ep1_decision.0111.desc0:"Several likely redecorating candidates present themselves
column2: those nearest and most noteworthy to me: the realms of [option_1.GetTitledFirstName]
column4:
and [option_3.GetTitledFirstName].

Selecting a style that's considered more renowned than my own court would be personally humbling but lend me some of the foreign realm's air of grandeur.

Conversely
column5: emulating a lesser realm would show magnanimity and build my legend abroad at the cost of some reputation at home."

column1: ep1_decision.0111.toast.t0:"[ROOT.Char.GetTitledFirstName] has emulated one of my halls"
ep1_decision.0111.c.greater_cgv0:"Perhaps a feast hall in the [option_3.GetPrimaryTitle.GetAdjectiveNoTooltip] style?"
ep1_decision.0111.c.lesser_cgv0:"Perhaps a rough [option_3.GetPrimaryTitle.GetAdjectiveNoTooltip] feast hall would be a novelty?"
ep1_decision.0111.d0:"These all seem quite #EMP alarmingly#! foreign..."
promote_other_culture_development_decision_desc0:"Let us reward those who have have served us loyally
column2: so that they can grow and develop alongside the dynasty that they serve so faithfully!"

column1: promote_other_culture_development_decision_tooltip0:"Improve the development of [counties|E] from different [cultures|E] with a high [cultural_acceptance|E]"
promote_other_culture_development_decision_not_acceptance_tt0:"There is no [culture|E] with a [cultural_acceptance|E] higher than #V 75%#! in your [realm|E]"

promote_other_culture_development_decision_no_effect0:"Every [county|E] in the [realm|E] from a [culture|E] with a [cultural_acceptance|E] higher than #V 75%#! gets [GetModifier('promote_culture_modifier' ).GetNameWithTooltip|L] for 10 years"
ep1_decision.0201.desc0:"At last the search for a [target_court_language.GetCourtLanguage.GetName] linguist has come to fruition. The candidates have been presented in front of me
column2: each of them carrying their own expertise in foreign languages."

column1: ep1_decision.0201.d0:"I know [cheap_linguist.GetNameNoTooltip] will practically work for free!"
